description: Cassandra Vector Store with search capabilities

database_ref.info: Contact points for the database (or Astra DB database ID)

username.info: Username for the database (leave empty for Astra DB).

token.info: User password for the database (or Astra DB token).

table_name.info: The name of the table (or Astra DB collection) where vectors will be stored.

ttl_seconds.info: Optional time-to-live for the added texts.

batch_size.info: Optional number of data to process in a single batch.

setup_mode.info: Configuration mode for setting up the Cassandra table, with options like 'Sync', 'Async', or 'Off'.

cluster_kwargs.info: Optional dictionary of additional keyword arguments for the Cassandra cluster.

search_score_threshold.info: Minimum similarity score threshold for search results. (when using 'Similarity with score threshold')

search_filter.info: Optional dictionary of filters to apply to the search query.

body_search.info: Document textual search terms to apply to the search query.

enable_body_search.info: Flag to enable body search. This must be enabled BEFORE the table is created.

success.store_created: Vector store created successfully in table '{table}'

errors.cassio_not_installed: Could not import cassio integration package. Please install it with `pip install cassio`.
errors.content_field_missing: You should ingest data through Langflow (or LangChain) to query it in Langflow. Your collection does not contain a field name 'content'.
errors.body_search_not_enabled: You should enable body search when creating the table to search the body field.

logs.detected_astra: Detected Astra DB with database ID: {database_id}
logs.detected_cassandra_multiple: Detected regular Cassandra with {count} contact points
logs.detected_cassandra_single: Detected regular Cassandra with contact point: {contact_point}
logs.connecting_astra: Connecting to Astra DB with database ID: {database_id}
logs.connecting_cassandra: Connecting to Cassandra - Contact Points: {contact_points}, Username: {username}
logs.adding_documents: Adding {count} documents to the Vector Store.
logs.creating_from_documents: Creating vector store from {count} documents - Table: {table}, Keyspace: {keyspace}
logs.no_documents: No documents to add to the Vector Store.
logs.creating_empty_store: Creating empty vector store - Table: {table}, Keyspace: {keyspace}
